alert.note: Alert for Yuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 8:30AM MDT until July 20 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 AM MDT FOR CENTRAL YUMA COUNTY... At 830 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles south of Burdett to 11 miles north of Cope, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Yuma, Wray, Eckley, Abarr, Heartstrong, Clarkville and Vernon. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 227 and 246, and between mile markers 248 and 250. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
